occur.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
occur.translation[0].definitions[0].note: In everyday English, people usually say happen rather than occur:
The accident happened while she was at school.
occur.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to happen or exist in a particular place or situation
occur.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Whooping cough occurs mainly in young children.
The highest rates of unemployment occur in the inner urban areas.
